articles.title: Millions of children at risk as vaccination uptake stalls - BBC
articles.summary: Millions of children at risk as vaccine uptake stalls Progress in vaccinating children against a variety of life-threatening diseases has stalled in the past two decades - and even gone backwards in some countries - a new global study suggests. The situation has been made worse by the Covid pandemic, leaving millions of children unprotected from diseases such as measles,...
